lyrics.text:
Te ne tuku hifo
‘A hono mālohi,
Ko hotau fetuku hake
Ki ‘olunga foki.

Tau mamata ‘i ai,
Ki hono fofonga
Pea ‘e ‘ikai toe fai
‘A e angahala.

Pea tau inu ai
‘I hono vaitafe,
‘A e fiefia lahi
Pea ta’engata.

‘Io, pea ‘i he
‘Ikai hoko ki ai,
Ka ko e ‘amanaki pē
Ki he lelei pehē.

‘Oku tupu mei ai
‘A e fiefia,
‘I he lelei ‘oku pehe
Pea ta’engata.
